column4: cinvoke> i can't help u. I've got just to inform u buddy i didn't have sound for A MONTH in Ubuntu . 5 days ago I changed my soundcard and everything is ok since the first Boot. It's really a main problem in Linux I think
bastid_raZor> junker=? i don't know what u mean
bastid_raZor>  that's true. It was the company's fault no to have Linux drivers...

thing that kills me, is even if a company doesn't write the drivers but at least uses a published spec or publishes their own, someone eventually writes one.  Its crap companies like broadcom that do neither that hurt
